Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Liv, can you analyze the material constituents inside the energy chamber?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I can't identify its properties, but I've been recording all the observational data. I'll hand it over to HQ after this.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'The energy chamber is changing in color!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'We can do nothing but wait now.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'But they do not know, what you have been going through.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "...Enough with the hogwash, at least my plan's complete.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "You're still so naive. Indeed, you have fended against the viral corruption with the power of Tenebrion, but can you really take all the credit?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'I admit, I needed your help there...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'We were always one, but your existence has proven the fragility of this body.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'But I, I am different. What I long for is absolute power.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'And for this, I am stronger than you.', 4: '2'}
